sentences.en: All who travel should be over cognizant of this fact.

sentences.en: As the doctor was fully cognizant the patient's serious condition, he acted swiftly to relieve it.

sentences.en: Be cognizant of the freedom of choice of individuals.

sentences.en: He is cognizant of his own situation.

However, we must remain humble, and cognizant of the fact that we must improve.

sentences.en: Vandenbergh is cognizant of the difficulty of extrapolating data from rodents and lower animals to humans.
